steps.name: Navigate to url:
BASE - Typing textbox by setValue function with value "******" and needClickOption is "true"
BASE - Typing textbox by setValue function with value "******" and needClickOption is "true"
BASE - Click general element
Project was cleaned
RETRY CREATE NEW PROJECT IN TIMES:
RETRY CREATE NEW PROJECT IN TIMES:
When I navigate to menu "Database" with submenu "Database Editor"
Then I should see Database screen display
When I add new table with Name "jitapi007d" and Comment "Testing"
Then I should see the table with Name "jitapi007d" display
When I add new column with Name "jitapicol007d" Type "string" for Table name "jitapi007d"
When I navigate to menu "API" without submenu
Then I should see API screen display
When I create new group API with name "groupapi007d"
Then I should see group api "groupapi007d" displayed in api list
When I select api name "groupapi007d" from list
When I add new API endpoint
When I set dropdown label "Method Type" in modal popup to value "POST"
When I set textbox label "URL" in modal popup to value "/v1/jitera/post"
When I set textbox label "Name" in modal popup to value "jitera create"
When I set dropdown label "Action" in modal popup to value "Create"
When I set dropdown label "Model" in modal popup to value "jitapi007ds"
When I press general button "Create" in modal popup
Then I should see method "POST" with endpoint "/v1/jitera/post" displayed
When I edit API method "POST" with endpoint "/v1/jitera/post"
When I click tab "SQL Query" in floating panel
When I add row Definition-Value index "1" with static value - value "jitapi007ds.jitapicol007d","static value","jitera post"
When I click tab "Request params" in floating panel
When I add row Params index "1" - value "jitapicol007d","String".
When I click tab "Response params" in floating panel
When I expand the row name "jitapi007d"
When I add row Params index "5" - value "jitapicol007d","Column Definition","jitapicol007d"
When I close the floating panel
Then I should see method "POST" with endpoint "/v1/jitera/post" displayed
When I navigate to menu "Database" with submenu "Database Editor"
Then I should see Database screen display
When I navigate to menu "API" without submenu
Then I should see API screen display
When I select api name "groupapi007d" from list
When I wait value-definition data API "jitapi007ds.jitapicol007d" table "1" is fetched completely
When I wait response params data API "jitapicol007d" with parent "jitapi007d" - row "5" is fetched completely
When I edit API method "POST" with endpoint "/v1/jitera/post"
When I click tab "SQL Query" in floating panel
Then I should see floating panel has Model with static value - DefinitionValue Table - row "1" - value "jitapi007ds.jitapicol007d","static value","jitera post"
When I click tab "Request params" in floating panel
Then I should see floating panel has Params - row "1" - value "jitapicol007d","String".
When I click tab "Response params" in floating panel
When I expand the row name "jitapi007d"
Then I should see floating panel has Params - row "5" - value "jitapicol007d","Column Definition","jitapicol007d"
When I close the floating panel
When I delete API method "POST" with endpoint "/v1/jitera/post"
Then I should NOT see method "POST" with endpoint "/v1/jitera/post" displayed
